name: Rockstar Name Generator
description: Ready to unleash your inner rock god? This generator conjures up the most electrifying, stage-worthy rockstar names this side of Valhalla! Get ready to shred... your old identity, that is!
introduction: So, you've got the guitar licks down, the leather pants are lookin' sharp, but your name?  Well, let's just say 'Mildred' doesn't exactly scream 'stadium sellout.' Fear not, aspiring rock legend! Our Rockstar Name Generator is here to christen you with a moniker that'll strike fear (and adoration) into the hearts of millions. Prepare to rock!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button (or smash it with the reckless abandon of a true rockstar... virtually, of course).
Behold! A brand new, totally rad rockstar name will appear before your very eyes.
Don't like it? Keep generating until you find the name that resonates with your rebellious spirit and insatiable desire for fame.
Once you've found 'The One,' practice signing autographs. You're gonna need it.

faqs.question: Is this generator actually going to make me a rockstar?
faqs.answer: While we can't guarantee sold-out arenas and screaming fans, we *can* guarantee you'll have a killer name that's half the battle! The rest is up to you and your musical talent (or lack thereof... hey, image is everything!).

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my band?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! In fact, we encourage it. Just imagine the headlines: 'The Sonic Anarchists, fronted by Blaze Thunderstone, set the stage on fire!'

faqs.question: Are the names generated completely random?
faqs.answer: Yes, they're a chaotic symphony of randomness, designed to produce names that are both unique and undeniably rock 'n' roll. We've got algorithms working harder than a roadie on tour!

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the names?
faqs.answer: Keep smashing that 'Generate' button! There are literally millions of potential combinations. Eventually, the perfect name will emerge from the digital ether.

faqs.question: Is this generator safe to use? Will it steal my soul?
faqs.answer: Perfectly safe! The only thing this generator will steal is your old, boring name. Your soul is safe… for now. (But seriously, no data is collected.)

faqs.question: Can I suggest prefixes or suffixes?
faqs.answer: We're always open to suggestions! Send us your wildest, most rockstar-worthy ideas and we might just add them to the mix. Let's make some noise together!
